import React ,{Component} from 'react' import {Row,Col ,Container, Media} from 'reactstrap' import ContainerImage from '../images/heroAppContainer.jpg' import PortraitImage from '../images/portrairWelcomeImage.jpg' import { withConfigConsumer } from 'antd/lib/config-provider/context' import {MainImage} from '../styles/syles' import {Grid} from 'material-ui/core' //Button import { Button} from 'reactstrap'; const WelcomeBody = () => { return (
window.innerWidth ? PortraitImage : ContainerImage }>
) } export default WelcomeBody
